channel.title: europe on Olli On Tour
channel.description: Recent content in europe on Olli On Tour

item.title: 2019: Canary Islands
item.description: Overview Flight to Teneriffe, only used for transfer Some days of hiking on El Hierro (Recommendation: Rother Wanderführer “El Hierro”, 14,80 €) Transfer Some days of hiking on La Palma (Recommendation: Rother Wanderführer “La Palma”, 14,80 €) One additional day before flight back home El Hierro On the way near Punta de los Bajones, El Hierro On the way near Punta de Malpais, El Hierro On Ruta del Agua towars Ventejis mountain, El Hierro Sunset, viewed from La Frontera, El Hierro Dragon tree near Tigaday, El Hierro View towards Tibataje near El Lunchón, El Hierro View above clouds, on top of the mountain near Ermita San Salvador, El Hierro Piscina Natural La Maceta, El Hierro

item.title: 2018: Ireland
item.description: Overview Short trip (7 days) with colleagues during summer. Road trip with rented car (prepare for left-hand traffic): Dublin - Doolin - Limerick - Killarney - Cork - Kilkenny - Dublin, with a booked daytrip by bus to Northern Ireland Route was very well chosen, with some nice spots to rest at the sea, and a good amount of historic sites. Can recommend to rent a cottage with fireplace if possible.

item.title: 2017: Sweden
item.description: Overview Short trip to mainly see the Nothern Lights in Abisko. Stayed a few days in Stockholm before taking a (recommended) night train up to Abisko. I had three nights to catch some Nothern Lights: one was very cloudy, one was partially cloudy, one was clear and it was for me one of the most majestic shows I have ever seen. I usually travel with one stuffed backpack. On these nights, I had to put on every piece of cloth I brought to Sweden.
